document.full_text: the oklahoma house passed a bill on tuesday supporters said was designed to increase the number of low-income students who can attend private schools by creating a state tax credit for gifts made to scholarship groups.
document.title: oklahoma passes tax credit for private school scholarships
lines_and_colors: the oklahoma house passed a bill on tuesday supporters said was designed to increase the number of low-income students who can attend private schools by creating a state tax credit for gifts made to scholarship groups.
